title: Interactive Cognitive Games Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want to access interactive cognitive games through voice commands so that I can stay mentally active and challenged according to my abilities.

title: Guided Physical Activity Challenges
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive guided physical activity challenges tailored to my abilities so that I can stay active and manage my health effectively.

title: Progress Tracking for Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my progress in physical and cognitive activities so that I can visualize my improvements and stay motivated.

title: Customizable Activity Schedules
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily modify my physical and cognitive activity schedules using voice commands so that I can stay engaged and active according to my preferences and daily routine.

title: Social Interaction Through Group Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily join group activities or challenges through voice commands so that I can stay socially connected and engaged with my peers.

title: Adaptive Activity Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to analyze my preferences and health data to provide tailored recommendations for physical and cognitive activities, so that I can stay engaged and active while ensuring my safety.
